item.title: Nginx SSL PEM_read_bio End of Line Error
item.description: We had this ssl cert issued by Network Solutions 1root@www:/etc/nginx/conf.d/ssl/example-2020# unzip -l EXAMPLE.ORG.zip 2Archive: EXAMPLE.ORG.zip 3Length Date Time Name 4--------- ---------- ----- ---- 52150 2020-07-14 16:59 DV_NetworkSolutionsDVServerCA2.crt 6Network Solutions DV Intermediate CA 72093 2020-07-14 16:59 DV_USERTrustRSACertificationAuthority.crt 8Network Solutions DV Intermediate CA 2 92174 2020-07-14 16:59 EXAMPLE.ORG.crt 10Domain certificate 11--------- ------- 126417 3 files I created a bundle as this was for Nginx cat EXAMPLE.ORG.crt DV_NetworkSolutionsDVServerCA2.crt DV_USERTrustRSACertificationAuthority.crt > www.example.org-bundle.crt When I tried verifying, I got this error:
